author: slaws
msg: Fix the URI algorithm so that the binding name is only included in the URI if a service has multiple bindings

author: slaws
msg: Use the registry to resolve de-serialized endpoint references

author: slaws
msg: Make endpoints point to the component/service for which they are created so that the URIs are correct. A previous change to the runtime wire now looks down the promotion hierarchy in order to find the leaf component and service

author: jacopoc
msg: Cleaned up the remaining csv widget forms that now use the new csv renderer.

author: slaws
msg: Remove the non-OASIS code from the endpoint builder and set up build-time and runt-time operations so that I can reorganize the endpoint reference build process and get all of the endpoint building code in on place.
